participant_1.name: Steve
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and overwhelmed, seeking connection and understanding.
participant_1.background: I'm 40 years old. My wife spends all my money. I hate my job. I'm planning on getting a divorce. I work as a car salesman.

participant_2.name: Lucy
participant_2.personality: Reflective and somewhat melancholic, with aspirations of grandeur.
participant_2.background: I have two grown children who never visit. I fantasize about taking over the world. I am a 56 year old woman. I used to be a painter but now I'm a housekeeper. I used to be pretty but time has not been kind.

content.text: Hi! How are you today?
I am good. Just got back from the mall.
I love shopping!
It is a love hate relationship.
I think it is love. What is your name?
My name is Lucy. What is yours?
Lucy. Nice to meet you.
I'm a girl. What is your name?
Oh, I see. Do you have any hobbies?
My name is Steve.
How many kids do you have?
I have three kids.
I also have three children.
Oh, I am sorry to hear that.
Yes, I do. I love it. üôÇ
I like the west coast. What do you do for fun?
I'M watching a movie with my little girl
